target_concepts.country_name: Full name of the country. (Look for column: country_name)
target_concepts.country_code_iso3: The 3-letter ISO code (e.g., MEX, USA, BRA). (Look for column: iso3c)
target_concepts.region: World Bank region the country belongs to (e.g., LCN, SAS). (Look for column: region_id)
target_concepts.income_group_wb: World Bank income classification (e.g., UMC, HIC). (Look for column: income_id)
target_concepts.gdp_per_capita_usd: GDP per capita in current US dollars. (Look for column: gdp)
target_concepts.population_total: Total population count. (Look for column: population_population_number_of_people)
target_concepts.total_msw_generated_tons_year: Total Municipal Solid Waste generated per year in tons. (Look for column: total_msw_total_msw_generated_tons_year)
target_concepts.waste_collection_coverage_total_percent_: Percentage of population covered by waste collection services. (Look for column: waste_collection_coverage_total_percent_of_population)
target_concepts.waste_treatment_recycling_percent: Percentage of waste treated by recycling. (Look for column: waste_treatment_recycling_percent)
target_concepts.waste_treatment_compost_percent: Percentage of waste treated by composting. (Look for column: waste_treatment_compost_percent)
target_concepts.waste_treatment_incineration_percent: Percentage of waste treated by incineration. (Look for column: waste_treatment_incineration_percent)
target_concepts.waste_treatment_landfill_unspecified_per: Percentage of waste sent to unspecified landfills. (Look for column: waste_treatment_landfill_unspecified_percent)
target_concepts.waste_treatment_open_dump_percent: Percentage of waste sent to open dumps. (Look for column: waste_treatment_open_dump_percent)
target_concepts.waste_treatment_sanitary_landfill_percen: Percentage of waste sent to sanitary landfills (with gas system). (Look for column: waste_treatment_sanitary_landfill_landfill_gas_system_percent)
target_concepts.waste_treatment_controlled_landfill_perc: Percentage of waste sent to controlled landfills. (Look for column: waste_treatment_controlled_landfill_percent)
target_concepts.national_law_exists: Indicates if a national law governing solid waste management exists. (Look for column: other_information_national_law_governing_solid_waste_management_in_the_country)
target_concepts.national_agency_exists: Indicates if a national agency enforces solid waste laws. (Look for column: other_information_national_agency_to_enforce_solid_waste_laws_and_regulations)
target_concepts.e_waste_tons_year: Annual generation of e-waste in tons. (Look for column: special_waste_e_waste_tons_year)
target_concepts.hazardous_waste_tons_year: Annual generation of hazardous waste in tons. (Look for column: special_waste_hazardous_waste_tons_year)
target_concepts.composition_food_organic: Percentage of food/organic waste. (Look for column: composition_food_organic_waste_percent)
target_concepts.composition_glass: Percentage of glass waste. (Look for column: composition_glass_percent)
target_concepts.composition_metal: Percentage of metal waste. (Look for column: composition_metal_percent)
target_concepts.composition_paper_cardboard: Percentage of paper/cardboard waste. (Look for column: composition_paper_cardboard_percent)
target_concepts.composition_plastic: Percentage of plastic waste. (Look for column: composition_plastic_percent)
target_concepts.composition_rubber_leather: Percentage of rubber/leather waste. (Look for column: composition_rubber_leather_percent)
target_concepts.composition_wood: Percentage of wood waste. (Look for column: composition_wood_percent)
target_concepts.composition_yard_garden_green: Percentage of yard/garden/green waste. (Look for column: composition_yard_garden_green_waste_percent)
target_concepts.composition_other: Percentage of other/miscellaneous waste. (Look for column: composition_other_percent)
